long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Dark Mode AI - IS IN ALPHA STAGE
------------------------------------------------------
Experience the internet in a whole new light (or lack thereof) with our AI-Powered Dark Mode Extension. Upgrade your browsing experience today and say goodbye to eye strain and late-night glare!
